item.title: Famed for its picturesque beauty
item.description:
20190508-Famed for its picturesque beauty
下载此壁纸（1920x1080）

With over 160 lighthouses across Nova Scotia, Canada, Peggy’s Cove Lighthouse is the most photographed one. It was built in 1915 and continues keeping watch over the surging ocean waves. The lighthouse is about an hour’s drive from Halifax. Along with this picturesque historic attraction, Peggy’s Cove is home to an active fishing community. The vibrant village attracts visitors for its fresh seafood, pristine beaches, kayaking adventures and soothing views like the one pictured here.
